info.name: Yahoo hide adblocker modal
info.description: Simply hides the modal they added recently (March 2018) to whitelist Yahoo in your adblocker and give feedback.
info.additionalInfo:
You might want to change the domain according to your needs (yahoo.com, yahoo.fr, yahoo.ca, etc.)

NOTE: I'm not using Yahoo that much so I don't know if this is still up to date.
